sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import FormatDate from "./FormatDate"; import WeatherIcon from "./WeatherIcon"; import "./Weather.css"; import WeatherUnits from "./WeatherUnits"; import WeatherTemperature from "./WeatherUnits"; export default function WeatherInfo(props) { return (

{props.info.city}

{props.info.description}

{Math.round(props.info.temperature)} °C | F
  • Humidity: {props.info.humidity} %
  • Wind: {props.info.wind} km/h
  • Feelslike:{" "} {Math.round(props.info.feelslike)} {" "} °C
); }
